title: Stop Whining Because You Don't Like Yasuo
body:
I'll preface with I'm not a super awesome {{champion:157}} player. 

That being said, new players flooding boards with "rework" ideas and "pls nerf" complaints is pretty silly.

With any 5 min google search I could point you all to a number of great guides on destroying him completely

Guess what though, he's just like any strong champion in the game meant to snowball.
If you deny kills, set up ganks, or bring good cc to the table you can beat him.

The W has a 20 cd. 
The shield requires him to move to recharge it
His ult requires knock ups and his teamfight can suffer if he's the only one with knock ups in the team

This means he has exploitable weaknesses. Spend the IP and learn him. Watch the guides how to beat him. Learn More champs.

His creation and balance took a lot of work and had many, many versions. I doubt he's getting touched any time soon
